ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He used to be joyful in his family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He lived rejoicing among his people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He used to live joyfully among his people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They lived among their people joyfully
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed he used to rejoice in his home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, he was among his people in joy!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely he was (erstwhile) joyful among his followers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He once lived among his family joyfully;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He verily lived joyous with his folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He used to be happy with his own people;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily he was among his people joyous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed he used to be joyful among his folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly, did he go about among his people, rejoicing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, he was among his people in joy!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Once, he lived joyfully among his family
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He used to be happy among his family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:13] Indeed among his folk, his clan, in the world, he used to be joyful, wanton, lusting after his desires;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: He verily lived joyous with his folk) he was happy with his folk,
